Package me.wobblyyyy.rlibx.hardware.encoder

Class EncoderConfig

java.lang.Object
me.wobblyyyy.rlibx.hardware.encoder.EncoderConfig
public class EncoderConfig
extends java.lang.Object
Configuration class for encoders.
Since:
0.1.0
Author:
Colin Robertson
